pageTitle: Prime Ministerâ€™s itinerary for Monday, March 1, 2021 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Ottawa, Ontario

Private meetings.

1:15 p.m. The Prime Minister, joined by Parliamentary Secretary to the Minister of Veterans Affairs and Associate Minister of National Defence Darrell Samson, will virtually meet with student council members from Island View High School in Eastern Passage, Nova Scotia.

The Prime Minister will chair the Cabinet meeting.

Closed to media.
